titles.title: Protect Patient Access to Quality Health Professionals Act of 2013
To amend title XXVII of the Public Health Service Act to remove the non-discrimination requirements relating to health care providers.
Protect Patient Access to Quality Health Professionals Act of 2013

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Protect Patient Access to Quality Health Professionals Act of 2013 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to remove prohibitions enacted under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act that prohibit a health plan from discriminating with respect to participation under the plan or coverage against any health care provider who is acting within the scope of that provider's license or certification under applicable state law.
